mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_wk_report
(SEQ, SAWON_CD, PART, GUBUN, SR_NO, SR_NM, DEV_ST_DT, DEV_END_DT, END_DT, PROG_RATE, PROG_STATUS, MEM_HOUR, BIGO, LEVEL, HJSYYB, Z_CREATE_BY, Z_CREATE_DATE, Z_UPDATE_BY, Z_UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( '3', '70020', '3', #{gubun}, #{srNo}, '한길형', #{devStDt}, #{devEndDt}, #{endDt}, '10', #{progStatus}, #{memHour}, #{bigo}, #{level}, '1', 'admin', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'admin', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM tb_wk_report WHERE 1=1 AND
SAWON_CD = #{sawonCd}
